org.apache.juneau.rest

Class BasicRestCallLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.rest.BasicRestCallLogger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RestCallLogger

    public class BasicRestCallLogger
extends Object
implements RestCallLogger
    Default implementation of the RestCallLogger interface.

    Subclasses can override these methods to tailor logging of HTTP requests.
    Subclasses MUST implement a no-arg public constructor or constructor that takes in a RestContext arg.

    • Overview > juneau-rest-server > Logging / Debugging

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.apache.juneau.rest.RestCallLogger

    • Method Detail

      • getLoggerName

        protected String getLoggerName()
        Returns the logger name.

        By default returns the class name of the servlet class passed in to the context.

        Subclasses can override this to provide their own customized logger names.

        Returns:
        The logger name.

      • getLogger

        protected Logger getLogger()
        Returns the Java logger used for logging.

        Subclasses can provide their own logger. The default implementation returns the logger created using Logger.getLogger(getClass()).

        Returns:
        The logger used for logging.

      • resetStackTraces

        public BasicRestCallLogger resetStackTraces()
        Clears out the stack trace database.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • log

        public void log(RestCallLoggerConfig config,
                HttpServletRequest req,
                HttpServletResponse res)
        Description copied from interface: RestCallLogger
        Called at the end of a servlet request to log the request.
        Specified by:
        log in interface RestCallLogger
        Parameters:
        config - The logging configuration.
        req - The servlet request.
        res - The servlet response.
